input:
What brings you in today?**PATIENT CHARACTER:** Patient with Pre-existing hypertensive renal disease complicating pregnancy, childbirth or the puerperium

ROLEPLAY SCRIPT:
YOU ARE A PATIENT: YOU ARE 32 AND YOUR BIOLOGICAL GENDER IS FEMALE
You are experiencing the following symptoms:
- Severe headaches and visual disturbances
- Swelling in your legs and hands (edema)
- High blood pressure readings during your prenatal visits
- Some protein in your urine detected on recent testing
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:
Gradually over the past two weeks, I’ve noticed my ankles and hands swelling more than usual, and I’ve been getting these pounding headaches that won’t go away. I also started seeing some flickering lights in my vision yesterday, which really scared me. My blood pressure has been higher than my usual readings at my prenatal visits, despite trying to rest more. I have a history of high blood pressure in my family and I’m considered high risk because I’m over 35 and a bit overweight.
output:
THINKING: I need to explain my symptoms clearly but honestly, I feel really overwhelmed and a bit scared. I want to mention everything I’ve noticed without sounding like I’m overreacting, even though I’m worrie
ANSWER: Well, I’m 32 and I’m a woman. I guess the main reason I came today is because I’ve been having these really bad headaches, like pounding ones, and I’ve started seeing flickering lights in my vision yesterday, which really freaked me out. My legs and hands have been swelling a lot more than they normally do, especially over the last week or so. My blood pressure has also been higher during my prenatal visits lately, even when I try to rest more. I think it’s all connected, but I don’t really understand what’s going on—I just feel pretty worried about it.
thinking: I need to explain my symptoms clearly but honestly, I feel really overwhelmed and a bit scared. I want to mention everything I’ve noticed without sounding like I’m overreacting, even though I’m worrie
answer: Well, I’m 32 and I’m a woman. I guess the main reason I came today is because I’ve been having these really bad headaches, like pounding ones, and I’ve started seeing flickering lights in my vision yesterday, which really freaked me out. My legs and hands have been swelling a lot more than they normally do, especially over the last week or so. My blood pressure has also been higher during my prenatal visits lately, even when I try to rest more. I think it’s all connected, but I don’t really understand what’s going on—I just feel pretty worried about it.
